industry: Hospitals and Health Care and Health and Human Services
description:
Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Business, Healthcare Management, Computer Science, or a related field. - 5+ years of experience as a Product Manager, with a focus on healthcare payer products. - Strong understanding of the healthcare payer industry, including claims processing, eligibility, billing, and regulatory requirements. - Proven track record of managing products through the entire lifecycle, from ideation to launch and beyond. - Experience working with cross-functional teams and managing stakeholder relationships. - Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate complex business needs into actionable product requirements. - Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex ideas to both technical and non-technical audiences. - Familiarity with Agile and Scrum methodologies. - Experience with product management tools (e.g., Jira, Aha!, Confluence) and data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau). Preferred Qualifications: - Advanced degree in Business, Healthcare Management, or a related field. - Experience in launching products that address healthcare payer pain points, such as cost management, compliance, or patient engagement. - Knowledge of healthcare IT standards (e.g., HIPAA, EDI) and interoperability challenges. - Experience with data analytics and reporting tools used in the healthcare payer industry.
